newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Manila shares end down, most oil,mining issues up.
newsitem.headline: Manila shares end down, most oil,mining issues up.

text.p: Philippine shares ended weaker on Friday as investors took profits in some blue-chips they bought in early trade and focused on small issues, traders said.

"We saw some selling pressure in Meralco and Ayala Land, for instance. Overall, the market is consolidating with attraction in speculative counters," said Nathan Lozada, assistant vice-president for sales at Philippine Asia Equity.
The index ended at 3,322.30 points, down 0.40 percent.
